sentences.en: Dutch colonial authorities imprisoned him for his part in the independence movement.
sentences.cn: 荷兰殖民当局因他参加独立运动而把他关押了起来。
杰拉尔德珍视自己刚赢得的自立。

sentences.en: Her independence and maverick behaviour precluded any chance of promotion.
sentences.cn: 她的独立精神和自行其是断送了一切升迁的机会。

sentences.en: Her independence of spirit marked her out from her male fellow officers.
sentences.cn: 她的独立精神使她有别于共事的男性军官。

sentences.en: His independence had been forged on the anvil of a harsh environment.
sentences.cn: 他的独立性是在艰苦的环境中锤炼出来的。

sentences.en: In 1816, Argentina declared its independence from Spain.
sentences.cn: 1816年，阿根廷宣布脱离西班牙正式独立。

sentences.en: Morocco's capital, until independence, was badly overcrowded.
sentences.cn: 摩洛哥的首都在独立前一直都拥挤不堪。

sentences.en: Slovenia will have to pay a high price for independence.
sentences.cn: 斯洛文尼亚将为独立付出巨大的代价。

sentences.en: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.cn: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

sentences.en: The pull-out of the army paves the way for independence.
sentences.cn: 军队的撤出为独立铺平了道路。

sentences.en: The resolution stopped short of an outright declaration of independence.
sentences.cn: 这项决议几乎成为公开的独立宣言。

sentences.en: The subject peoples of her empire were anxious for their own independence.
sentences.cn: 她的帝国中被迫向她臣服的民族迫切渴望自身的独立。

sentences.en: The treaty binds them to respect their neighbour's independence.
sentences.cn: 条约规定他们必须尊重其邻国的独立。

sentences.en: Their wages do, however, allow them a degree of independence.
sentences.cn: 不过，他们的工资确实给了他们一定的独立。

sentences.en: There were two main political groupings pressing for independence.
sentences.cn: 有两大主要的政治团体要求独立。

sentences.en: They have their own independence movement which is gathering strength.
sentences.cn: 他们自己发起了独立运动，其力量正逐渐壮大。

sentences.en: ways of helping old people maintain their independence .
sentences.cn: 帮助老年人保持独立的方法。

words.tran_cn: 独立的；单独的；无党派的；不受约束的
独立；组合教会制；独立国

phrases.tran_cn: 独立大厅（位于美国费城，独立宣言签字处）

trans.tran_en: political freedom from control by the government of another country
